content:
Attached is the advertisement for an open position in Vienna, Austria, in a company that works in English. Open-Position-202010.pdf

They are searching for a programmer, preferably with functional programming background (Haskell, F#) and .net. The job is mainly implementing and testing new AI methods for a healthcare application.
The position is in R&D, probably more D then R though. The position includes, for example, choosing and implementing correct data structures and algorithms to implement the desired workflow.

The company is open to applicants with a mostly academic background.
